snippet.title: Game & Watch - Donkey Kong II (c)1983 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description:
Donkey Kong 2 (or Donkey Kong II) is a Game & Watch title from Nintendo, it was released in 1983 and actually sees you playing as Donkey Kong Jr.  This is another that's been emulated for a while now, but for which there wasn't a high quality video on this channel.  Thanks to hap and Sean Riddle for the emulation on display here.  Much like the original Donkey Kong this one has quite laggy feeling controls by design.

Game & Watch artwork for MAME was done by DarthMarino (more recently emulated units) and hydef (units emulated before 2020)
https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1vl9O-0jIGCHHY_lrWpOwBtqTXEKsVGOY  DarthMarino 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1WLKcvynl0ky2mRL1UacA9yaiMTnNs4x5 hydef
